summary: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.
cast: Louis Jourdan|Adrienne Barbeau|Ray Wise|David Hess|Nicholas Worth|Don Knight|Al Ruban|Dick Durock|Ben Bates|Nannette Brown|Reggie Batts|Mimi Craven|Karen Price|Bill Erickson|Dov Gottesfeld|Tommy Madden|Richard Jennings
keywords: swamp|scientist|based on comic book|dc comics|government agent
title: La cosa del pantano
